    • Method Detail

      • buildNotification

        private Notification buildNotification()
        Builds the notification that is shown on the Notification Bar on the Android System. It has the battery level as the title and "Battery Left" as the subtitle.
        Returns:
        The notification that is displayed.

      • getBatteryLevelIcon

        private int getBatteryLevelIcon(int level)
        Parameters:
        level - The current battery level
        Returns:
        The icon associated with the level

      • getBatteryLevel

        private int getBatteryLevel()

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate()
        This is called when the service is first created.

      • onStartCommand

        public int onStartCommand(Intent intent,
                 int flags,
                 int startID)
        Whenever startService is called with this service, onStartCommand is always called.
        Parameters:
        intent - What the service is supposed to do.
        flags - Not used at all
        startID - Not used at all
        Returns:
        START_STICKY meaning that the service, if killed, will be restarted with a null intent

      • onBind

        public IBinder onBind(Intent intent)

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
        Called when the service is destroyed
